subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Orioles’ ballpark in Baltimore, built in 1992, has undergone a modest face lift, turning an unused area in center field into a roof deck and adding murals and bronze statues.
snippet: The Orioles’ ballpark in Baltimore, built in 1992, has undergone a modest face lift, turning an unused area in center field into a roof deck and adding murals and bronze statues.
